org.apache.poi.hssf.usermodel

Class HSSFOptimiser

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.poi.hssf.usermodel.HSSFOptimiser

  • public class HSSFOptimiser
extends java.lang.Object
    Excel can get cranky if you give it files containing too many (especially duplicate) objects, and this class can help to avoid those. In general, it's much better to make sure you don't duplicate the objects in your code, as this is likely to be much faster than creating lots and lots of excel objects+records, only to optimise them down to many fewer at a later stage. However, sometimes this is too hard / tricky to do, which is where the use of this class comes in.(如果您给Excel提供包含太多（特别是重复）对象的文件，它可能会变得古怪，而这个类可以帮助避免这些情况。一般来说，最好确保不要在代码中复制对象，因为这可能比创建大量的excel对象+记录要快得多，只是为了在稍后的阶段将它们优化到更少。然而，有时这太难/太棘手了，这就是使用这个类的原因。)

      static void optimiseCellStyles(HSSFWorkbook workbook)
      Goes through the Wokrbook, optimising the cell styles by removing duplicate ones, and ones that aren't used.(查看Wokrbook，通过删除重复的单元格和未使用的单元格样式来优化单元格样式。)
      static void optimiseFonts(HSSFWorkbook workbook)
      Goes through the Workbook, optimising the fonts by removing duplicate ones.(查看工作簿，通过删除重复的字体来优化字体。)

    • Method Detail

      • optimiseFonts

        public static void optimiseFonts(HSSFWorkbook workbook)
        Goes through the Workbook, optimising the fonts by removing duplicate ones. For now, only works on fonts used in HSSFCellStyle and HSSFRichTextString. Any other font uses (eg charts, pictures) may well end up broken! This can be a slow operation, especially if you have lots of cells, cell styles or rich text strings(查看工作簿，通过删除重复的字体来优化字体。目前，仅适用于HSSFCellStyle和HSSFRichText字符串中使用的字体。任何其他字体使用（例如图表、图片）很可能最终会损坏！这可能是一个缓慢的操作，特别是如果您有很多单元格、单元格样式或富文本字符串)
        Parameters:
        workbook - The workbook in which to optimise the fonts(workbook -用于优化字体的工作簿)

      • optimiseCellStyles

        public static void optimiseCellStyles(HSSFWorkbook workbook)
        Goes through the Wokrbook, optimising the cell styles by removing duplicate ones, and ones that aren't used. For best results, optimise the fonts via a call to optimiseFonts(HSSFWorkbook) first.(查看Wokrbook，通过删除重复的单元格和未使用的单元格样式来优化单元格样式。为了获得最佳结果，请首先通过调用optimiseFonts（HSSFWorkbook）来优化字体。)
        Parameters:
        workbook - The workbook in which to optimise the cell styles(workbook -用于优化单元格样式的工作簿)
